document_data.name: Urmlaspyr Keep
document_data.mainbody: '''Urmlaspyr Keep''' was an aging fortress located in the city of [[Urmlaspyr]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Location: The Keep sat on the southern end of ridge that rose out of the eastern sections of the city.
document_data.Activities: The encrusted battlements of Urmlaspyr Keep were used as a barracks for the [[Helms]] and a jail.
